abstract: Even as prices fall, neither Sony’s Blu-ray nor Toshiba’s HD DVD, has gained an advantage.
snippet: Even as prices fall, neither Sony’s Blu-ray nor Toshiba’s HD DVD, has gained an advantage.
lead_paragraph: What if nobody wins the high-definition DVD format wars? That increasingly looks to be the situation for the next-generation DVD technology, which is available to consumers in two incompatible formats.

headline.main: In the DVD War Over High Definition, Most Buyers Are Sitting It Out
headline.print_headline: In the DVD War Over High Definition, Most Buyers Are Sitting It Out
